019
020package com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.design;
021
022import java.util.ArrayDeque;
023import java.util.Deque;
024
025import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.FileStatefulCheck;
026import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.AbstractCheck;
027import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.DetailAST;
028import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.FullIdent;
029import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.TokenTypes;
030import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.utils.ScopeUtil;
031
032/**
033 * <p>
034 * Checks that a class which has only private constructors
035 * is declared as final. Doesn't check for classes nested in interfaces
036 * or annotations, as they are always {@code final} there.
037 * </p>
038 * <p>
039 * To configure the check:
040 * </p>
041 * <pre>
042 * &lt;module name=&quot;FinalClass&quot;/&gt;
043 * </pre>
044 *
045 * @since 3.1
046 */
047@FileStatefulCheck
048public class FinalClassCheck
049    extends AbstractCheck {
050
051    /**
052     * A key is pointing to the warning message text in "messages.properties"
053     * file.
054     */
055    public static final String MSG_KEY = "final.class";
056
057    /**
058     * Character separate package names in qualified name of java class.
059     */
060    private static final String PACKAGE_SEPARATOR = ".";
061
062    /** Keeps ClassDesc objects for stack of declared classes. */
063    private Deque<ClassDesc> classes;
064
065    /** Full qualified name of the package. */
066    private String packageName;
067
068    @Override
069    public int[] getDefaultTokens() {
070        return getRequiredTokens();
071    }
072
073    @Override
074    public int[] getAcceptableTokens() {
075        return getRequiredTokens();
076    }
077
078    @Override
079    public int[] getRequiredTokens() {
080        return new int[] {TokenTypes.CLASS_DEF, TokenTypes.CTOR_DEF, TokenTypes.PACKAGE_DEF};
081    }
082
083    @Override
084    public void beginTree(DetailAST rootAST) {
085        classes = new ArrayDeque<>();
086        packageName = "";
087    }
088
089    @Override
090    public void visitToken(DetailAST ast) {
091        final DetailAST modifiers = ast.findFirstToken(TokenTypes.MODIFIERS);
092
093        switch (ast.getType()) {
094            case TokenTypes.PACKAGE_DEF:
095                packageName = extractQualifiedName(ast.getFirstChild().getNextSibling());
096                break;
097
098            case TokenTypes.CLASS_DEF:
099                registerNestedSubclassToOuterSuperClasses(ast);
100
101                final boolean isFinal = modifiers.findFirstToken(TokenTypes.FINAL) != null;
102                final boolean isAbstract = modifiers.findFirstToken(TokenTypes.ABSTRACT) != null;
103
104                final String qualifiedClassName = getQualifiedClassName(ast);
105                classes.push(new ClassDesc(qualifiedClassName, isFinal, isAbstract));
106                break;
107
108            case TokenTypes.CTOR_DEF:
109                if (!ScopeUtil.isInEnumBlock(ast)) {
110                    final ClassDesc desc = classes.peek();
111                    if (modifiers.findFirstToken(TokenTypes.LITERAL_PRIVATE) == null) {
112                        desc.registerNonPrivateCtor();
113                    }
114                    else {
115                        desc.registerPrivateCtor();
116                    }
117                }
118                break;
119
120            default:
121                throw new IllegalStateException(ast.toString());
122        }
123    }
124
125    @Override
126    public void leaveToken(DetailAST ast) {
127        if (ast.getType() == TokenTypes.CLASS_DEF) {
128            final ClassDesc desc = classes.pop();
129            if (desc.isWithPrivateCtor()
130                && !desc.isDeclaredAsAbstract()
131                && !desc.isDeclaredAsFinal()
132                && !desc.isWithNonPrivateCtor()
133                && !desc.isWithNestedSubclass()
134                && !ScopeUtil.isInInterfaceOrAnnotationBlock(ast)) {
135                final String qualifiedName = desc.getQualifiedName();
136                final String className = getClassNameFromQualifiedName(qualifiedName);
137                log(ast, MSG_KEY, className);
138            }
139        }
140    }
141
142    /**
143     * Get name of class (with qualified package if specified) in {@code ast}.
144     * @param ast ast to extract class name from
145     * @return qualified name
146     */
147    private static String extractQualifiedName(DetailAST ast) {
148        return FullIdent.createFullIdent(ast).getText();
149    }
150
151    /**
152     * Register to outer super classes of given classAst that
153     * given classAst is extending them.
154     * @param classAst class which outer super classes will be
155     *                 informed about nesting subclass
156     */
157    private void registerNestedSubclassToOuterSuperClasses(DetailAST classAst) {
158        final String currentAstSuperClassName = getSuperClassName(classAst);
159        if (currentAstSuperClassName != null) {
160            for (ClassDesc classDesc : classes) {
161                final String classDescQualifiedName = classDesc.getQualifiedName();
162                if (doesNameInExtendMatchSuperClassName(classDescQualifiedName,
163                        currentAstSuperClassName)) {
164                    classDesc.registerNestedSubclass();
165                }
166            }
167        }
168    }
169
170    /**
171     * Get qualified class name from given class Ast.
172     * @param classAst class to get qualified class name
173     * @return qualified class name of a class
174     */
175    private String getQualifiedClassName(DetailAST classAst) {
176        final String className = classAst.findFirstToken(TokenTypes.IDENT).getText();
177        String outerClassQualifiedName = null;
178        if (!classes.isEmpty()) {
179            outerClassQualifiedName = classes.peek().getQualifiedName();
180        }
181        return getQualifiedClassName(packageName, outerClassQualifiedName, className);
182    }
183
184    /**
185     * Calculate qualified class name(package + class name) laying inside given
186     * outer class.
187     * @param packageName package name, empty string on default package
188     * @param outerClassQualifiedName qualified name(package + class) of outer class,
189     *                           null if doesn't exist
190     * @param className class name
191     * @return qualified class name(package + class name)
192     */
193    private static String getQualifiedClassName(String packageName, String outerClassQualifiedName,
194                                                String className) {
195        final String qualifiedClassName;
196
197        if (outerClassQualifiedName == null) {
198            if (packageName.isEmpty()) {
199                qualifiedClassName = className;
200            }
201            else {
202                qualifiedClassName = packageName + PACKAGE_SEPARATOR + className;
203            }
204        }
205        else {
206            qualifiedClassName = outerClassQualifiedName + PACKAGE_SEPARATOR + className;
207        }
208        return qualifiedClassName;
209    }
210
211    /**
212     * Get super class name of given class.
213     * @param classAst class
214     * @return super class name or null if super class is not specified
215     */
216    private static String getSuperClassName(DetailAST classAst) {
217        String superClassName = null;
218        final DetailAST classExtend = classAst.findFirstToken(TokenTypes.EXTENDS_CLAUSE);
219        if (classExtend != null) {
220            superClassName = extractQualifiedName(classExtend.getFirstChild());
221        }
222        return superClassName;
223    }
224
225    /**
226     * Checks if given super class name in extend clause match super class qualified name.
227     * @param superClassQualifiedName super class qualified name (with package)
228     * @param superClassInExtendClause name in extend clause
229     * @return true if given super class name in extend clause match super class qualified name,
230     *         false otherwise
231     */
232    private static boolean doesNameInExtendMatchSuperClassName(String superClassQualifiedName,
233                                                               String superClassInExtendClause) {
234        String superClassNormalizedName = superClassQualifiedName;
235        if (!superClassInExtendClause.contains(PACKAGE_SEPARATOR)) {
236            superClassNormalizedName = getClassNameFromQualifiedName(superClassQualifiedName);
237        }
238        return superClassNormalizedName.equals(superClassInExtendClause);
239    }
240
241    /**
242     * Get class name from qualified name.
243     * @param qualifiedName qualified class name
244     * @return class name
245     */
246    private static String getClassNameFromQualifiedName(String qualifiedName) {
247        return qualifiedName.substring(qualifiedName.lastIndexOf(PACKAGE_SEPARATOR) + 1);
248    }
249
250    /** Maintains information about class' ctors. */
251    private static final class ClassDesc {
252
253        /** Qualified class name(with package). */
254        private final String qualifiedName;
255
256        /** Is class declared as final. */
257        private final boolean declaredAsFinal;
258
259        /** Is class declared as abstract. */
260        private final boolean declaredAsAbstract;
261
262        /** Does class have non-private ctors. */
263        private boolean withNonPrivateCtor;
264
265        /** Does class have private ctors. */
266        private boolean withPrivateCtor;
267
268        /** Does class have nested subclass. */
269        private boolean withNestedSubclass;
270
271        /**
272         *  Create a new ClassDesc instance.
273         *  @param qualifiedName qualified class name(with package)
274         *  @param declaredAsFinal indicates if the
275         *         class declared as final
276         *  @param declaredAsAbstract indicates if the
277         *         class declared as abstract
278         */
279        /* package */ ClassDesc(String qualifiedName, boolean declaredAsFinal,
280                boolean declaredAsAbstract) {
281            this.qualifiedName = qualifiedName;
282            this.declaredAsFinal = declaredAsFinal;
283            this.declaredAsAbstract = declaredAsAbstract;
284        }
285
286        /**
287         * Get qualified class name.
288         * @return qualified class name
289         */
290        private String getQualifiedName() {
291            return qualifiedName;
292        }
293
294        /** Adds private ctor. */
295        private void registerPrivateCtor() {
296            withPrivateCtor = true;
297        }
298
299        /** Adds non-private ctor. */
300        private void registerNonPrivateCtor() {
301            withNonPrivateCtor = true;
302        }
303
304        /** Adds nested subclass. */
305        private void registerNestedSubclass() {
306            withNestedSubclass = true;
307        }
308
309        /**
310         *  Does class have private ctors.
311         *  @return true if class has private ctors
312         */
313        private boolean isWithPrivateCtor() {
314            return withPrivateCtor;
315        }
316
317        /**
318         *  Does class have non-private ctors.
319         *  @return true if class has non-private ctors
320         */
321        private boolean isWithNonPrivateCtor() {
322            return withNonPrivateCtor;
323        }
324
325        /**
326         * Does class have nested subclass.
327         * @return true if class has nested subclass
328         */
329        private boolean isWithNestedSubclass() {
330            return withNestedSubclass;
331        }
332
333        /**
334         *  Is class declared as final.
335         *  @return true if class is declared as final
336         */
337        private boolean isDeclaredAsFinal() {
338            return declaredAsFinal;
339        }
340
341        /**
342         *  Is class declared as abstract.
343         *  @return true if class is declared as final
344         */
345        private boolean isDeclaredAsAbstract() {
346            return declaredAsAbstract;
347        }
348
349    }
350
351}
